LABEL: 0x2C2
STRING: I stepped into the godless, dark depths of the sea.

LABEL: 0x2E6
STRING: I made my way down to the world below, taking every step to avoid being abandoned by the weak gravity.

LABEL: 0x397
STRING: I took my time descending the ramp, taking care not to let go of the deep aquarium I held in my hand.

LABEL: 0x409
STRING: And then―I felt the unstable ground beneath my feet.

LABEL: 0x43D
STRING: Should I call this a sandy beach or a quagmire?

LABEL: 0x46F
STRING: I tried to convince myself that it was because of the cold that my body trembled from the sinking sensation.

LABEL: 0x4B9
STRING: Feelings I had forgotten came back to me.

LABEL: 0x53A
STRING: In other words; fear, loneliness, impatience, and despair.

LABEL: 0x566
STRING: And for the first time in half a day, the deep sea became a reality for me instead of a dream.

LABEL: 0x5A4
STRING: ――Yes, a dream.

LABEL: 0x61D
STRING: 「Ooh――」

LABEL: 0x637
STRING: With the night vision scope's calibration complete, the sea was filled with indigo-colored serenity.

LABEL: 0x691
STRING: It was completely different from yesterday when I was toyed with and robbed of my vision by the drifting sand.

LABEL: 0x6EB
STRING: A clear sea.

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: It was like a dream.

LABEL: 0x725
STRING: I had thought that the dark scenery in which I couldn't see even a step ahead was the deep sea itself, but it seemed that I was completely mistaken.

LABEL: 0x795
STRING: There was nothing here.

LABEL: 0x7AF
STRING: In front of my small eyes was the bottom of an endless sea.

LABEL: 0x805
STRING: I stood there, overwhelmed.

LABEL: 0x829
STRING: I guess it was human nature to want to burn this empty and grand view into your mind.

LABEL: 0x87F
STRING: Was that an excuse to be paralyzed by fear?

LABEL: 0x8BD
STRING: Slowly, slowly, my gaze crawled to the sea floor.

LABEL: 0x8F9
STRING: On closer inspection, it wasn't just sand. There were boulder-like lumps of various sizes here and there.

LABEL: 0x95F
STRING: I could see moss-like objects stuck to each of them.

LABEL: 0x9A3
STRING: Something like a feather fluttering in the drifting waves flickered across my vision.

LABEL: 0x9F5
STRING: A faint and vague presence of life.

LABEL: 0xA21
STRING: This was the first time I'd seen the bottom of the sea clearly, but I felt a gentle sense of deja vu.

LABEL: 0xA6F
STRING: Long,

LABEL: 0xAEF
STRING: long ago――

LABEL: 0xB09
STRING: I had read an old novel in my sister's room without permission――

LABEL: 0xB3F
STRING: "The Hermit on the Sea Floor Lives for Vengeance"――

LABEL: 0xBCF
STRING: ――I see.

LABEL: 0xBE9
STRING: So this was the true face of the deep sea.

LABEL: 0xC11
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xC86
STRING: Returning to my senses, I took another step into the deep sea.

LABEL: 0xCC4
STRING: Instantly, a cloud of sand rose up in front of me, making me halt.

LABEL: 0xD12
STRING: It was like the untouched seabed was just an illusion that had faded away.

LABEL: 0xD66
STRING: Even though I was at the bottom of the sea, it felt like I was walking over clouds, one step at a time.

LABEL: 0xDAC
STRING: A total freedom from gravity.

LABEL: 0xDD8
STRING: The grandeur and freedom of the universe were like a curse to me inside my small and dark suit.

LABEL: 0xE36
STRING: How could I think of doing anything in a world that wasn't controlled by anything?

LABEL: 0xE8A
STRING: It was so suffocating that I wanted to take off my diving suit and be crushed by the unbearable weight of the water.

LABEL: 0xEF6
STRING: ――There was plenty of oxygen left.

LABEL: 0xF1C
STRING: That was just my assumption.

LABEL: 0xF46
STRING: I breathed in and out deeply, slowly, and firmly.

LABEL: 0xF7E
STRING: I looked forward.

LABEL: 0xF96
STRING: It's okay―there's no danger of any kind.

LABEL: 0xFCE
STRING: It was just cold. That was the only reason I was shivering.

LABEL: 0x108F
STRING: ――Suddenly.

LABEL: 0x10A7
STRING: As I continued walking, I saw something shiny to my left.

LABEL: 0x10DF
STRING: I turned my body around slowly, and the origin of the shine revealed itself.

LABEL: 0x11E3
STRING: Irregular light patterns.

LABEL: 0x1207
STRING: A single-color tone flickered there, searing my pupils while painting a mysterious four-dimensional spiral.

LABEL: 0x1323
STRING: The source of the illumination that was many times richer than neon signs was actually a jellyfish.

LABEL: 0x136D
STRING: It shimmered and shone in this deep sea where waves were scarce, drifting as if observing this foreign object called "me."

LABEL: 0x13D7
STRING: ――The glowing jellyfish split in two.

LABEL: 0x1403
STRING: No, that was wrong.

LABEL: 0x141D
STRING: Another jellyfish of the same species appeared from behind, also glowing and flickering about.

LABEL: 0x1483
STRING: And then, another from the other side, and another...

LABEL: 0x14BB
STRING: The light propagated as if inviting me to go deeper and deeper.

LABEL: 0x14F1
STRING: It was as mysterious as a single animal trail appearing in a forest, and it lured me in like a trap welcoming intruders.

LABEL: 0x155F
STRING: What lay beyond the light?

LABEL: 0x158B
STRING: Following my curiosity, I found myself treading the path shown to me.

LABEL: 0x16C1
STRING: For a moment, my vision darkened―or so it had seemed.

LABEL: 0x16F7
STRING: Was I just tired? ...No.

LABEL: 0x1725
STRING: As I thought that, I turned my head to my right――

LABEL: 0x17D4
STRING: My breath was taken away.

LABEL: 0x17EC
STRING: My voice didn't come out.

LABEL: 0x180A
STRING: My words were swallowed.

LABEL: 0x1826
STRING: By what?

LABEL: 0x183A
STRING: ――The answer was simple.

LABEL: 0x185A
STRING: By what was right in front of me.

LABEL: 0x187C
STRING: The first thing I saw was a sharp head.

LABEL: 0x18A4
STRING: Leading the streamlined, supple torso was a wide-open jaw like that of a carnivorous dinosaur.

LABEL: 0x1900
STRING: Inside its jaws, needle-like teeth were lined up without gaps.

LABEL: 0x1936
STRING: Once its prey was grasped, it would likely never be released again.

LABEL: 0x197C
STRING: Even if they could escape, there was no way they would get away unscathed after being attacked by those big jaws and sharp teeth.

LABEL: 0x19DA
STRING: There was no bloated belly from devouring its prey.

LABEL: 0x1A1A
STRING: Only sharpness.

LABEL: 0x1A3C
STRING: A form optimized only for capturing and killing its prey.

LABEL: 0x1A80
STRING: A living weapon.

LABEL: 0x1A9A
STRING: What in the hell was this deep-sea shark, which was more terrifying than any I have ever seen?

LABEL: 0x1B5B
STRING: Should I... run away?

LABEL: 0x1B7B
STRING: Or would it recognize me as prey as soon as I moved and attack?

LABEL: 0x1BC5
STRING: I felt like a foolish hunter encountering a bear in the woods.

LABEL: 0x1BF7
STRING: In an unknown area, in the other's territory.

LABEL: 0x1C23
STRING: The only difference was that I knew what a bear was. Here, I didn't really know what I was up against――

LABEL: 0x1C81
STRING: Some have said that dolphins are gifted with a relatively high level of intelligence.

LABEL: 0x1CC7
STRING: Depending on how you looked at it, even this deep-sea shark could be a part of the vivid seas painted by Lassen.

LABEL: 0x1D1F
STRING: And, look...

LABEL: 0x1D3D
STRING: As it swam about lazily, our eyes met――

LABEL: 0x1DEE
STRING: ...This diving suit was sturdy enough to withstand the depth of 700 meters, of course.

LABEL: 0x1E32
STRING: Even if attacked by a shark, it should be able to hold out without any problems.

LABEL: 0x1E7E
STRING: ...Even though I knew this, there was no way I could suppress the fear that welled up inside me...

LABEL: 0x1EDC
STRING: I closed my eyes for a dozen seconds.

LABEL: 0x1F00
STRING: By the time I opened them again, only its tail fin was visible out of the corner of my eye.

LABEL: 0x1F48
STRING: I let out a breath.

LABEL: 0x1F72
STRING: What a relief――

LABEL: 0x1F92
STRING: My hands were still shaking, however.

LABEL: 0x1FC4
STRING: Fear of the unknown.

LABEL: 0x1FE6
STRING: I had never seen anything like that in my life.

LABEL: 0x2028
STRING: I had seen many deep-sea fish in illustrated books and as stuffed animals several times.

LABEL: 0x2090
STRING: But as to whether that had made me more tolerant of seeing them in the flesh, well... the result was as you saw.

LABEL: 0x20F0
STRING: As with anything, seeing the real thing and seeing pictures were two very different things.

LABEL: 0x219D
STRING: Even so――

LABEL: 0x21BB
STRING: ――I remembered my sister calling these things "cute."

LABEL: 0x21FB
STRING: Since she was part of a deep-sea exploration team, she had the chance to actually see and touch them.

LABEL: 0x2233
STRING: And somehow, she still said that they were cute.

LABEL: 0x228D
STRING: I really didn't get her...

LABEL: 0x2312
STRING: What came to my mind next was Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x23A1
STRING: Just like me, she didn't know anything about deep-sea fish except what she had read in books and from models.

LABEL: 0x23EF
STRING: That was probably why she couldn't let this opportunity pass.

LABEL: 0x243F
STRING: ...Maybe I should have brought her along after all.

LABEL: 0x2485
STRING: Of course, the thought of encountering a giant shark like the one I saw just now made me think otherwise.

LABEL: 0x2550
STRING: ――I quickly raised my head and turned my attention to the vast space before me.

LABEL: 0x258E
STRING: It was like a treasure trove of life.

LABEL: 0x2619
STRING: The wriggling lights and a life of all sizes reflected in it.

LABEL: 0x2649
STRING: White marine snow continued to fall slowly from above.

LABEL: 0x268D
STRING: 「Amazing...」

LABEL: 0x26B3
STRING: It was a mystical scene so lively that it seemed to contradict the silence. I couldn't help but let my thoughts out.

LABEL: 0x2711
STRING: On the surface, it'd be midsummer.

LABEL: 0x2733
STRING: White snow was beginning to dissolve from the sea.

LABEL: 0x2759
STRING: As I watched the dreadfully slow descent of the marine snow,

LABEL: 0x27A3
STRING: I felt as though the flow of time had changed.

LABEL: 0x27E5
STRING: It seemed like I couldn't touch it even if I were to reach out.

LABEL: 0x281B
STRING: It felt unreal, like I was gazing at events on the other side of an open window in the distance.

LABEL: 0x2867
STRING: A feeling of helplessness.

LABEL: 0x287D
STRING: With that, I saw a jellyfish appear right next to me, catching the marine snow with its tentacles.

LABEL: 0x28DF
STRING: A surprisingly sluggish food chain.

LABEL: 0x2907
STRING: It could be seen as languid or graceful. A life that was never in a hurry to live, but never in a hurry to die, either.

LABEL: 0x2959
STRING: Marine snow―corpses of the strong raining down from the heavens.

LABEL: 0x299D
STRING: Life in the deep sea thrived on the remnants of life that had fought and died.

LABEL: 0x29F3
STRING: They kept on waiting at the bottom of the endless sea.

LABEL: 0x2A23
STRING: Death was raining down on me.

LABEL: 0x2A3F
STRING: 「Behold, I will rain bread down from the heavens for you.」

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: Raining down from the heavens――

LABEL: 0x2AA7
STRING: A life where all you could do was pray and wait for salvation――

LABEL: 0x2AED
STRING: I wondered how that must feel.

LABEL: 0x2B94
STRING: That's right―I forgot.

LABEL: 0x2BB6
STRING: There was no time for sentimentality.

LABEL: 0x2BDA
STRING: I needed to find Scalyfoot...

LABEL: 0x2C12
STRING: I started walking again――

LABEL: 0x2CF6
STRING: I looked down at my feet and slowly walked forward, careful not to miss a step on the unsteady sea floor.

LABEL: 0x2D4A
STRING: With my feet caught in the sand, I advanced slowly and quietly...

LABEL: 0x2D92
STRING: I walked through a soundless, pure, and cold world.

LABEL: 0x2DDA
STRING: She had said that Scalyfoot was a shellfish.

LABEL: 0x2E0C
STRING: And since it had a shell, it wouldn't be swimming.

LABEL: 0x2E46
STRING: I couldn't imagine how it looked at all.

LABEL: 0x2E6C
STRING: Would it be just lying on the bottom of the sea...? No, even so...

LABEL: 0x2EC2
STRING: Swimming――

LABEL: 0x2FB2
STRING: What was that just now?

LABEL: 0x2FD0
STRING: I tried to rub my eyes without thinking, forgetting that I was wearing a helmet.

LABEL: 0x3016
STRING: What was that... It looked like miniature cotton...?

LABEL: 0x3052
STRING: Was I seeing things――

LABEL: 0x306C
STRING: No, that couldn't be it.

LABEL: 0x3090
STRING: I twisted my body and stared in the direction it was headed.

LABEL: 0x30CC
STRING: ...There was no doubt about it.

LABEL: 0x30F2
STRING: Something flat had just crossed my field of vision.

LABEL: 0x3126
STRING: ...Was it a sea slug?

LABEL: 0x314A
STRING: I turned toward it again.

LABEL: 0x3242
STRING: I remembered how I had met her.

LABEL: 0x3270
STRING: If I remembered correctly, the thing she was chasing at the time was also a sea slug.

LABEL: 0x32B2
STRING: It was a hectic but fun moment.

LABEL: 0x32DC
STRING: Now, it felt like it happened ages ago.

LABEL: 0x3308
STRING: ...I bet Tokiwa would be happy to see this sea slug (temp.)

LABEL: 0x334A
STRING: ――Okay.

LABEL: 0x3362
STRING: I lifted the deep aquarium in my left hand.

LABEL: 0x33A4
STRING: Merely finding a Scalyfoot didn't mean I'd be able to catch one.

LABEL: 0x33FA
STRING: What was important was practicing in advance.

LABEL: 0x341C
STRING: This was the perfect opponent.

LABEL: 0x3444
STRING: I opened the hatch attached to the top of the aquarium.

LABEL: 0x3486
STRING: Even if I couldn't catch something quick like a fish, this sea slug (temp.) should be doable.

LABEL: 0x34DE
STRING: I slowly kicked off the ground and began my approach...

LABEL: 0x3514
STRING: 「Here I go!」

LABEL: 0x3534
STRING: I put the deep aquarium on my prey and――

LABEL: 0x35CF
STRING: ――Instantly.

LABEL: 0x35E7
STRING: I was sure to aim at the sea slug (temp.), but somehow it easily dodged my hand.

LABEL: 0x3645
STRING: No, it hadn't dodged it.

LABEL: 0x366B
STRING: Moving the aquarium so quickly, which was by no means small, created a current of water that swept it away.

LABEL: 0x3736
STRING: It was no use... I couldn't think of this like I was catching bugs.

LABEL: 0x3768
STRING: I was a little embarrassed at my earlier confidence, to be honest.

LABEL: 0x379E
STRING: Still, with this, I should have gotten the gist of it.

LABEL: 0x37D4
STRING: Next time, for sure――

LABEL: 0x37F0
STRING: 「Here we...

LABEL: 0x3866
STRING: go!」

LABEL: 0x387C
STRING: It was an unconvincing shout if I said so myself.

LABEL: 0x38B6
STRING: Unlike before, however,

LABEL: 0x38F0
STRING: I had moved the deep aquarium slowly to not create any waves, which had paid off.

LABEL: 0x39A3
STRING: 「There!」

LABEL: 0x39BB
STRING: I caught it.

LABEL: 0x39D7
STRING: I couldn't help but let out a cry of astonishment.

LABEL: 0x39FD
STRING: I quickly closed the hatch so that it wouldn't be able to escape and peered inside through the round window.

LABEL: 0x3A47
STRING: ...Hmm.

LABEL: 0x3A61
STRING: It really did look strange.

LABEL: 0x3A8B
STRING: Was this truly a sea slug?

LABEL: 0x3AB1
STRING: Now that I looked closely, it was shining and fluttering somehow.

LABEL: 0x3AE5
STRING: It stretched its translucent body and swam through the tank as it glowed.

LABEL: 0x3B2F
STRING: This was... if I had to say...

LABEL: 0x3B5B
STRING: A jellyfish.

LABEL: 0x3B71
STRING: Yeah. This was a jellyfish. A yellow one, it looked like.

LABEL: 0x3BAB
STRING: ...Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0x3BC9
STRING: Whatever this was, I caught one and got the hang of it for now.

LABEL: 0x3C0B
STRING: Everything was ready.

LABEL: 0x3C25
STRING: All that was left was to find Scalyfoot, and I'd complete the mission...

LABEL: 0x3C7F
STRING: ――Hm.

LABEL: 0x3C95
STRING: It was good to be enthusiastic, but...

LABEL: 0x3D1E
STRING: 「What the hell is a Scalyfoot?」

LABEL: 0x3DAB
STRING: Tokiwa had told me it was a shellfish.

LABEL: 0x3DD5
STRING: I understood that much, so was I just looking for a shell...?

LABEL: 0x3E27
STRING: Thinking about it calmly, I didn't even know what a Scalyfoot was, much less its appearance.

LABEL: 0x3E9F
STRING: I should have looked it up in the database beforehand, but... it was too late for that now.

LABEL: 0x3EF5
STRING: Surrounded by these strange creatures lurking in the depths of the sea, there was no way it would look like a normal shellfish.

LABEL: 0x3F69
STRING: What kind of mysterious form did it possess?

LABEL: 0x3FC1
STRING: That said, besides it having a shell, there wasn't much to go on.

LABEL: 0x4003
STRING: Just thinking about the face she would make if I brought her the wrong one made my heart ache.

LABEL: 0x4061
STRING: Anyway, let's do what we can for now.

LABEL: 0x40F4
STRING: I looked down at my feet.

LABEL: 0x4110
STRING: One of the downsides of this suit was the fact that I couldn't turn my head directly downward.

LABEL: 0x415C
STRING: While praying that Scalyfoot couldn't swim, I scanned for anything that would match the description.

LABEL: 0x41DE
STRING: Sure, there were rugged rocks here and there at my feet, but there was no sign of anything that looked like a shell.

LABEL: 0x4276
STRING: Hmm...

LABEL: 0x428C
STRING: I didn't see anything that looked like one.

LABEL: 0x42BE
STRING: Was I being too preconceived?

LABEL: 0x42E2
STRING: Could it be that there was actually a shell mixed in with what I was seeing...?

LABEL: 0x432A
STRING: Could this rock actually be a shell?

LABEL: 0x435C
STRING: ...It was possible.

LABEL: 0x4378
STRING: This was the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x4396
STRING: There was no telling what might happen.

LABEL: 0x43BA
STRING: After seeing that strange little sea slug (temp.), the shining jellyfish, and that fiendish deep-sea shark, there was no longer any telling what could show up.

LABEL: 0x442C
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x4446
STRING: 「...This isn't it.」

LABEL: 0x4462
STRING: The thing I picked up could only be described as a rock.

LABEL: 0x44A2
STRING: The Rock.

LABEL: 0x44B8
STRING: A rock that I couldn't complain about.

LABEL: 0x44E6
STRING: If this thing was alive, I would have to change the way I looked at life.

LABEL: 0x4538
STRING: Picking up a rock like this and calling it a living thing or a shell...

LABEL: 0x4576
STRING: I guess I was too easily fooled by the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x45A0
STRING: 「Where are you, shellfish...?」

LABEL: 0x4684
STRING: I staggered around, muttering like a sleepwalker.

LABEL: 0x46D4
STRING: Three thousand miles in search of a shellfish... No, wouldn't it be twenty thousand?

LABEL: 0x470C
STRING: That wasn't funny, was it...?

LABEL: 0x4738
STRING: From the images I'd seen before, I was pretty sure shellfish were usually clustered together.

LABEL: 0x4784
STRING: I imagined them growing on a deep-sea rock face...

LABEL: 0x47C4
STRING: There was no sign of that anywhere.

LABEL: 0x47F0
STRING: At the same time, the amount of light entering my field of vision was gradually increasing compared to before.

LABEL: 0x4830
STRING: In the darkness, small lights flashed from various distances.

LABEL: 0x486E
STRING: Although chaotic, I thought they blinked in unison every now and then―a true essence of bioluminescence.

LABEL: 0x48C2
STRING: I could feel the presence of life everywhere around me.

LABEL: 0x48EE
STRING: ...Yes, there was no mistaking it.

LABEL: 0x491E
STRING: If I continued in this direction, I should be able to bring back a souvenir for Tokiwa, even if a colony similar to the images wasn't there.

LABEL: 0x4994
STRING: I charged toward the soft, swirling light without stopping――

LABEL: 0x4AAA
STRING: Hmm...

LABEL: 0x4AC4
STRING: ...I turned around hesitantly.

LABEL: 0x4B47
STRING: Darkness.

LABEL: 0x4B5F
STRING: Naturally... This was the deep sea.

LABEL: 0x4B8B
STRING: A chill suddenly ran down my spine.

LABEL: 0x4BB1
STRING: I turned around and faced forward again.

LABEL: 0x4C34
STRING: There was no light.

LABEL: 0x4C50
STRING: Before I knew it, the vortex of light from the deep-sea creatures that had attracted me had vanished as if its existence had been a dream.

LABEL: 0x4D1D
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x4D3F
STRING: 「Can you hear me?」

LABEL: 0x4D95
STRING: ...Hey.

LABEL: 0x4DAD
STRING: Was I lost in the deep sea?

LABEL: 0x4DCF
STRING: This wasn't funny.

LABEL: 0x4DEF
STRING: What was I going to do?

LABEL: 0x4E0D
STRING: Even if I made a sound, it wouldn't reach anyone.

LABEL: 0x4E39
STRING: Looking out into the clear sea, I couldn't see the <SHEEP III> anywhere.

LABEL: 0x4E88
STRING: ...Did I really screw this up...?

LABEL: 0x4EB8
STRING: 「Shit...」

LABEL: 0x4ED0
STRING: Anyway, let's go back the way I came from.

LABEL: 0x4EFC
STRING: The way I came from...

LABEL: 0x4F1A
STRING: ...Umm.

LABEL: 0x4F34
STRING: 「No, it's probably this way...」

LABEL: 0x4F5E
STRING: I knew no one could hear me, but I ended up talking, whether it was consciously or not.

LABEL: 0x4FBC
STRING: If I didn't do that, I would lose it.

LABEL: 0x4FEC
STRING: Lose what?

LABEL: 0x5000
STRING: This was the deep sea, so it should be obvious.

LABEL: 0x5032
STRING: I frantically continued walking in the direction I had come from.

LABEL: 0x5072
STRING: ...See? I knew it. I recognize this place.

LABEL: 0x50A2
STRING: Like that rock over there, and... this rock.

LABEL: 0x50CC
STRING: But isn't that rock the same as this one?

LABEL: 0x5100
STRING: That rock... Which rock?

LABEL: 0x5181
STRING: 「No, this is bad...」

LABEL: 0x51A5
STRING: This was bad.

LABEL: 0x51BB
STRING: I admitted it.

LABEL: 0x51D3
STRING: My sense of direction was off.

LABEL: 0x51F7
STRING: I was... lost.

LABEL: 0x5274
STRING: 「Is anyone there...?」

LABEL: 0x52A8
STRING: There was no way there would be an answer.

LABEL: 0x52CE
STRING: Instantly, I felt sweat pouring out of every gland in my body.

LABEL: 0x530A
STRING: This was bad.

LABEL: 0x5320
STRING: I was alone in this vast sea.

LABEL: 0x5348
STRING: Left behind in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x5368
STRING: ――Isolated.

LABEL: 0x5380
STRING: 「Haah, haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x53A6
STRING: I could hear my own loud breathing.

LABEL: 0x53D2
STRING: I held my breath.

LABEL: 0x53EC
STRING: The silence was too loud.

LABEL: 0x540A
STRING: It was pressing against my ears.

LABEL: 0x5432
STRING: Desperately moving forward, I ran away from the approaching nothingness.

LABEL: 0x54C3
STRING: I felt like I was choking.

LABEL: 0x54DD
STRING: It hurt.

LABEL: 0x54F3
STRING: I wanted to slit my own throat.

LABEL: 0x5515
STRING: I wanted to take off my helmet.

LABEL: 0x553D
STRING: I couldn't even wipe away my sweat in this cramped suit, and I felt sick.

LABEL: 0x55EA
STRING: No, no, no, no, no.

LABEL: 0x560E
STRING: I didn't want to die.

LABEL: 0x562A
STRING: In a place like this,

LABEL: 0x5644
STRING: without anyone knowing,

LABEL: 0x5662
STRING: with no one caring...

LABEL: 0x567C
STRING: I didn't want to die in isolation.

LABEL: 0x56BA
STRING: My breathing grew ragged.

LABEL: 0x56D6
STRING: I was hyperventilating.

LABEL: 0x56EE
STRING: I was wasting too much oxygen.

LABEL: 0x571A
STRING: I had to do something about this feeling of suffocation...

LABEL: 0x57A7
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x57BF
STRING: I lost my balance and collapsed on the spot.

LABEL: 0x57FB
STRING: The moment I fell, I understood the reality before me.

LABEL: 0x583F
STRING: ...Was I going to die?

LABEL: 0x5863
STRING: There was no way I'd give up yet.

LABEL: 0x588F
STRING: I started walking again, aimlessly.

LABEL: 0x591C
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x593E
STRING: I walked down a path without an end.

LABEL: 0x5962
STRING: I had walked on unsteady feet for a while now.

LABEL: 0x5990
STRING: I had no sense of the time, and my consciousness was growing hazy.

LABEL: 0x59CA
STRING: Even my dragging legs were finally starting to hurt.

LABEL: 0x5A08
STRING: But, I didn't stop.

LABEL: 0x5A2E
STRING: Once I stopped, I'd...

LABEL: 0x5ACF
STRING: As I walked, I looked up.

LABEL: 0x5AF5
STRING: The scenery hadn't changed at all.

LABEL: 0x5B1F
STRING: I couldn't see anything in the distance.

LABEL: 0x5B43
STRING: Darkness.

LABEL: 0x5B5D
STRING: A black sea.

LABEL: 0x5B75
STRING: And...

LABEL: 0x5BA3
STRING: 「Tokiwa...」

LABEL: 0x5BBF
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0x5BDB
STRING: 「Hiragino-san...」

LABEL: 0x5C13
STRING: 「Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0x5C2F
STRING: I didn't want to stop.

LABEL: 0x5C53
STRING: But would I really be able to keep going like this?

LABEL: 0x5C93
STRING: Could I keep walking until I reached the <SHEEP III>?

LABEL: 0x5CCE
STRING: Or would I wander in this darkness forever...?

LABEL: 0x5D12
STRING: An overwhelming sense of powerlessness hit me.

LABEL: 0x5D30
STRING: 「At this rate...」

LABEL: 0x5D4E
STRING: Sweat trickled down my face.

LABEL: 0x5D68
STRING: The oxygen should be flowing normally, but I felt like I was suffocating.

LABEL: 0x5DB6
STRING: 「Aaaah...」

LABEL: 0x5DD2
STRING: I wondered if I was going back the way I came from.

LABEL: 0x5E06
STRING: I had walked straight ahead...

LABEL: 0x5E2A
STRING: That should have been the case, but there was no way to know for sure at this point.

LABEL: 0x5E66
STRING: So...

LABEL: 0x5E7C
STRING: I was at my limit.

LABEL: 0x5EB0
STRING: My feet...

LABEL: 0x5EC6
STRING: Stopped...

LABEL: 0x5EE0
STRING: 「Come on...」

LABEL: 0x5F57
STRING: ――It was useless.

LABEL: 0x5F71
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0x5F8D
STRING: At the bottom of the sea, without any help...

LABEL: 0x5FBB
STRING: Even if help arrived to the <SHEEP III> now, there was no way for me to know.

LABEL: 0x6008
STRING: I wondered how long I'd walked since I lost track of where I was.

LABEL: 0x6050
STRING: My sense of direction was long gone.

LABEL: 0x6088
STRING: I didn't even have the confidence to walk in a straight line anymore.

LABEL: 0x60D0
STRING: This wasn't something I was doing for myself, but for her...

LABEL: 0x6112
STRING: So how did it end up like this?

LABEL: 0x613A
STRING: ...Was this a punishment?

LABEL: 0x6156
STRING: This?

LABEL: 0x616C
STRING: Many lives were lost.

LABEL: 0x6196
STRING: And this was the price I had to pay?

LABEL: 0x61BA
STRING: In a dark,

LABEL: 0x61D4
STRING: murky,

LABEL: 0x61E8
STRING: meaningless place like this.

LABEL: 0x620C
STRING: All alone――

LABEL: 0x6283
STRING: 「I've had enough――」

LABEL: 0x62A9
STRING: Had I walked for an hour?

LABEL: 0x62CE
STRING: Time felt infinite.

LABEL: 0x62F4
STRING: A distance that felt infinitely long.

LABEL: 0x631A
STRING: I walked.

LABEL: 0x6332
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x634A
STRING: But there was nothing I could do anymore.

LABEL: 0x6386
STRING: I stopped in place and sat down.

LABEL: 0x63BC
STRING: 「I give up...」

LABEL: 0x63D8
STRING: It was pointless now.

LABEL: 0x63F4
STRING: I couldn't help it.

LABEL: 0x6416
STRING: There was nothing more I could do.

LABEL: 0x6440
STRING: I didn't think I could keep walking on forever and be saved.

LABEL: 0x6484
STRING: So, what was the point of stopping here...?

LABEL: 0x64C4
STRING: I sat down at the bottom of the sea and gazed upward.

LABEL: 0x64FA
STRING: The diving suit was uncomfortable.

LABEL: 0x6518
STRING: There was no sky in the place I forced myself to look up to.

LABEL: 0x654A
STRING: There was a bright world above me somewhere, but 700 meters was too far away from it.

LABEL: 0x6588
STRING: At least...

LABEL: 0x65A0
STRING: At the very least, if there was light――

LABEL: 0x663D
STRING: Suddenly, I spotted something.

LABEL: 0x6669
STRING: What was that thing on the rocks in the distance?

LABEL: 0x669D
STRING: A brightly-colored, long, and narrow stick-like object.

LABEL: 0x66D1
STRING: The shape, which appeared to have been designed by human hands, gave off a strikingly different feeling in this place ruled by the laws of nature。

LABEL: 0x674B
STRING: 「Wait...」

LABEL: 0x6767
STRING: Designed by human hands...

LABEL: 0x6781
STRING: The submarine that once sank...

LABEL: 0x67A7
STRING: If... if this was the area where my sister came to and conducted their investigation...

LABEL: 0x67F9
STRING: ――Then the <SHEEP III> shouldn't be far from it.

LABEL: 0x682A
STRING: After all, that ship was supposed to go to the place where she and the others had gone.

LABEL: 0x6880
STRING: I took a deep breath to calm myself.

LABEL: 0x68B8
STRING: I had to return to the submarine.

LABEL: 0x68E2
STRING: I had to return.

LABEL: 0x68FE
STRING: There was no chance someone would come to my help here,

LABEL: 0x693A
STRING: and there wasn't an infinite amount of oxygen left in the tank.

LABEL: 0x696C
STRING: My body was gradually losing its warmth...

LABEL: 0x69A6
STRING: I had to hurry.

LABEL: 0x69C8
STRING: Was there anything I could use as a guide――

LABEL: 0x69F0
STRING: Suddenly, when I looked up, I could see something wriggling in the distance.

LABEL: 0x6A30
STRING: Those were――

LABEL: 0x6A48
STRING: 「Bubbles...?」

LABEL: 0x6A62
STRING: Were there air bubbles rising from somewhere?

LABEL: 0x6A86
STRING: From a submarine volcano, I guess...

LABEL: 0x6AAA
STRING: No, even if it was a volcano, in principle, there was no way it could produce air bubbles.

LABEL: 0x6AF0
STRING: Then what the hell was this...?

LABEL: 0x6B14
STRING: A mysterious phenomenon that I had no idea of.

LABEL: 0x6B3E
STRING: I needed to get back to the ship as soon as possible... I knew that.

LABEL: 0x6B84
STRING: It might be dangerous. I couldn't deny that.

LABEL: 0x6BBA
STRING: Still, I might be able to find some kind of clue rather than just walking around aimlessly.

LABEL: 0x6C0E
STRING: And so, I walked toward the rising bubbles――

LABEL: 0x6D08
STRING: 「...What is this?」

LABEL: 0x6D2E
STRING: When I arrived, I saw the source.

LABEL: 0x6D6A
STRING: But I still didn't understand what it was.

LABEL: 0x6D9E
STRING: A froth of bubbles was literally rising up from it.

LABEL: 0x6DD4
STRING: Tracing back to where the bubbles were coming from... I could see what looked like a tube.

LABEL: 0x6E24
STRING: It was clearly man-made.

LABEL: 0x6E4A
STRING: A cross-section that looked like a hose ripped off by force.

LABEL: 0x6E92
STRING: What in the world was this?

LABEL: 0x6EB4
STRING: Still in my uncomfortable diving suit, I crouched and groped at the tube.

LABEL: 0x6EFC
STRING: The other end of the tube continued into the sand and mud at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x6F3C
STRING: 「Hey, now...」

LABEL: 0x6F62
STRING: I stood up and surveyed the area.

LABEL: 0x6F8A
STRING: Upon closer inspection, I saw another thin, dark line rising up nearby.

LABEL: 0x6FD2
STRING: No, it wasn't just one. On the other side, there were another two, three...

LABEL: 0x7016
STRING: ――There might be a clue here.

LABEL: 0x7048
STRING: I hesitantly turned my head in that direction.

LABEL: 0x707A
STRING: What in the hell was this?

LABEL: 0x7096
STRING: Were these signs of some kind of conspiracy?

LABEL: 0x70BE
STRING: Atlantis?

LABEL: 0x70DC
STRING: A chill ran down my spine.

LABEL: 0x70FC
STRING: But... I couldn't stop here.

LABEL: 0x7130
STRING: I continued forward with renewed enthusiasm――

LABEL: 0x71D7
STRING: My body floated?

LABEL: 0x71F5
STRING: Like an astronaut floating in space.

LABEL: 0x722F
STRING: Losing control of gravity, floating in the lonely sea――

LABEL: 0x7267
STRING: That momentary hallucination was drowned out by the terrible noise of the sand.

LABEL: 0x736B
STRING: 「Bwah!」

LABEL: 0x7383
STRING: Oh, I had just tripped.

LABEL: 0x73A7
STRING: ...Seemed like I had tripped over something.

LABEL: 0x73CD
STRING: My sense of balance and the inescapable gravity from before were clear evidence of it.

LABEL: 0x740B
STRING: I lay face down on the ground and let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x744B
STRING: This was what happened when I hurried and lowered my guard.

LABEL: 0x7481
STRING: Nee-san would scold me again... Not that that was happening.

LABEL: 0x74B9
STRING: Shaking off my emotions, I looked up.

LABEL: 0x74E5
STRING: The deep aquarium I had let go of was lying at the end of my outstretched left arm.

LABEL: 0x753B
STRING: I quickly got up on my knees and retrieved it.

LABEL: 0x756B
STRING: And while I was at it――

LABEL: 0x7585
STRING: A terrible amount of sand had billowed up, and I searched around my feet.

LABEL: 0x75B9
STRING: What the hell did I trip over?

LABEL: 0x765A
STRING: As I prodded, I immediately felt something.

LABEL: 0x7692
STRING: It was a big, blocky, solid object.

LABEL: 0x76C2
STRING: I wiped the dirt off its surface.

LABEL: 0x76EC
STRING: And when I did――

LABEL: 0x7761
STRING: 「A plate...?」

LABEL: 0x777B
STRING: It was a large, flat plate.

LABEL: 0x77A5
STRING: It was clearly artificial... What was it doing down here?

LABEL: 0x77E1
STRING: I lightly tapped the surface of it.

LABEL: 0x7809
STRING: It looked to be black, but it seemed to be made of metal.

LABEL: 0x7847
STRING: The plate itself was so large that even with the help of underwater buoyancy, it wasn't floating at all.

LABEL: 0x78AD
STRING: What exactly was this?

LABEL: 0x78D7
STRING: The first thing that came to my mind was the submarine that had once sank into this sea.

LABEL: 0x7919
STRING: Was this the wreckage of that...?

LABEL: 0x7945
STRING: For that matter, I didn't see any other parts around...

LABEL: 0x7983
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x7999
STRING: Right in front of me, I spotted an area where the ground was unnaturally rising for less than a meter.

LABEL: 0x79F7
STRING: I immediately hurried over and wiped its surface.

LABEL: 0x7A2D
STRING: ――Just as I expected.

LABEL: 0x7A49
STRING: A black metal plate appeared, the same as before.

LABEL: 0x7A7D
STRING: 「A coincidence? ...That can't be.」

LABEL: 0x7AB9
STRING: This was such an incomprehensible situation that I couldn't help but retort myself.

LABEL: 0x7B13
STRING: I didn't have the luxury of fooling around.

LABEL: 0x7B55
STRING: Between that strange tube and these metal plates...

LABEL: 0x7B91
STRING: These mysterious man-made objects in the depths of the sea made me anxious whether I liked it or not.

LABEL: 0x7C46
STRING: What was this situation...?

LABEL: 0x7C68
STRING: What was I encountering right now...?

LABEL: 0x7C96
STRING: As usual, I recalled an old sci-fi horror movie that had already reached a status of a classic.

LABEL: 0x7CE6
STRING: It was made half a century ago, but it was still a famous movie regarded as a masterpiece.

LABEL: 0x7D3E
STRING: A crew of a space freighter received a strange signal and descended to an alien planet.

LABEL: 0x7D88
STRING: And that was when they encountered a mysterious egg.

LABEL: 0x7DE6
STRING: ――Did I hear a scream?

LABEL: 0x7E97
STRING: ...I couldn't help but turn around.

LABEL: 0x7EC7
STRING: There was nothing.

LABEL: 0x7EE1
STRING: Of course. This was the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x7F09
STRING: What was I thinking?

LABEL: 0x7F27
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x7F47
STRING: There was no one here, and I couldn't see anything.

LABEL: 0x7F6F
STRING: Of course... That was all well and good...

LABEL: 0x7F9F
STRING: If I didn't pay attention, my breathing would naturally pick up speed.

LABEL: 0x7FD1
STRING: ――I couldn't waste oxygen.

LABEL: 0x8003
STRING: I took a deep, deep breath and exhaled.

LABEL: 0x802F
STRING: 「Haaaah――」

LABEL: 0x8049
STRING: ――I felt like I had traveled somewhere far away.

LABEL: 0x8083
STRING: In the end, I didn't have anything to lead me back to the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x80C4
STRING: There was something about this place, and I knew it wasn't a coincidence, but...

LABEL: 0x8128
STRING: ...Could I make it back to the submarine and tell someone about it?

LABEL: 0x8178
STRING: 「...How do I get back...?」

LABEL: 0x81A6
STRING: What should I do...? Oh, right.

LABEL: 0x8227
STRING: I strained my eyes and surveyed the distance, high above.

LABEL: 0x825D
STRING: ...Why hadn't I noticed?

LABEL: 0x828D
STRING: I had been watching the open sea from inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x82CD
STRING: In other words, even from the open sea, I should be able to see inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x830B
STRING: Even from a distance, I should be able to see the lights of the windows. Based on the shape of the windows, there should be three rows of circular lights.

LABEL: 0x8393
STRING: That should be the case, but――

LABEL: 0x83CF
STRING: Why couldn't I see them...?

LABEL: 0x83F7
STRING: It was strange... It was strange, but...

LABEL: 0x8421
STRING: Was it possible that I just couldn't see them, even if the submarine was continuously emitting that kind of light?

LABEL: 0x8504
STRING: I couldn't see much yesterday because of all the sand, but it should be different this time.

LABEL: 0x8574
STRING: Today, I should be able to spot the <SHEEP III> easily.

LABEL: 0x85D9
STRING: But, if I remembered correctly――

LABEL: 0x8667
STRING: ...No, I didn't know.

LABEL: 0x868B
STRING: Yesterday, I'd been fumbling around while following the hull, and my vision had been useless.

LABEL: 0x86E1
STRING: There wasn't a single light in the rear section in the first place.

LABEL: 0x871D
STRING: And today, too, I hadn't consciously looked back toward the hull.

LABEL: 0x875F
STRING: ...Actually, walking without turning around was why I was in this mess to begin with.

LABEL: 0x87AF
STRING: 「...Haah.」

LABEL: 0x87D3
STRING: I stopped walking and stood still at the bottom of the sea.

LABEL: 0x880B
STRING: Silence seeped in, along with a chill.

LABEL: 0x883B
STRING: There were traces of life all around me, but no one was there.

LABEL: 0x8873
STRING: All I could see were inorganic rocks and mountains of sand.

LABEL: 0x88A1
STRING: This must be what it felt like to be at the end of the world, far from reality...

LABEL: 0x8970
STRING: 「...Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x898C
STRING: I called out into the void.

LABEL: 0x89AC
STRING: A voice that shouldn't be audible.

LABEL: 0x89D4
STRING: A message that shouldn't reach anyone... I knew that, but...

LABEL: 0x8A1A
STRING: It came out without thinking.

LABEL: 0x8A4A
STRING: My voice didn't echo and was instead absorbed by the heavy waters of the deep sea and vanished.

LABEL: 0x8AB0
STRING: Seeping and falling.

LABEL: 0x8AE0
STRING: 「Are you in this sea, Nee-san?」

LABEL: 0x8B0C
STRING: The bottom of the sea, where my sister sank――

LABEL: 0x8B34
STRING: I sat down using my oxygen tank as a support, leaving my body to the waves.

LABEL: 0x8B92
STRING: Then, I closed my eyes.

LABEL: 0x8BB4
STRING: Embraced by the gentle waves, I tried to feel my sister, her warmth――

LABEL: 0x8C00
STRING: But all I could feel from my limbs was the cold.

LABEL: 0x8C9D
STRING: 「Nee-san――」

LABEL: 0x8CB9
STRING: 「I've come this far.」

LABEL: 0x8CDF
STRING: 「Chasing after you.」

LABEL: 0x8CFF
STRING: 「On the finest submarine in the world.」

LABEL: 0x8D29
STRING: 「All the way to the bottom of the sea...」

LABEL: 0x8D63
STRING: 「The deep-sea fish weren't very cute...」

LABEL: 0x8D97
STRING: 「Your tastes really are weird.」

LABEL: 0x8DC5
STRING: 「...You're somewhere in here, aren't you?」

LABEL: 0x8E01
STRING: 「I was going to find you and bring you home, but...」

LABEL: 0x8E47
STRING: 「...I'm sorry. I don't think that's going to happen now.」

LABEL: 0x8E71
STRING: 「If it was going to turn out like this, I should've brought that pendant with me...」

LABEL: 0x8EC7
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x8EDD
STRING: 「I won't leave you alone in this sea.」

LABEL: 0x8F11
STRING: 「I'll be here with you――」

LABEL: 0x8F3D
STRING: ――In that instant.

LABEL: 0x8F55
STRING: I felt something bright on the other side of my closed eyelids.

LABEL: 0x8F8B
STRING: I held up my hand and opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0x906D
STRING: 「Ugh――」

LABEL: 0x9087
STRING: I sensed a strong light to my right. What was that...?

LABEL: 0x90DD
STRING: The violently intense light gradually faded into the distance, showing its small and weak original brightness.

LABEL: 0x913B
STRING: But even as faint as it was, it was still vivid and alluring...

LABEL: 0x9189
STRING: I headed for the source of the light at an unsteady pace, as if I was inside an illusion.

LABEL: 0x9236
STRING: And then, new lights appeared to my left.

LABEL: 0x9264
STRING: As if inspired by that, this time, far to my right――

LABEL: 0x9301
STRING: They lit up one by one. Specks of light were slowly flickering on and off.

LABEL: 0x933F
STRING: It was like the equilibrium of the deep, dark sea had been broken, and crystal flowers were blooming one after another inside a beaker――

LABEL: 0x93A1
STRING: And then, there was an overwhelming brightness―tiny points of light scattered about the area, covering the sea floor.

LABEL: 0x9423
STRING: What was this scene...?

LABEL: 0x9445
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x946D
STRING: It was an illusion that felt both beautiful and scary.

LABEL: 0x94A5
STRING: Yes, an illusion.

LABEL: 0x94C1
STRING: I didn't want to think of it as real.

LABEL: 0x94FD
STRING: Reality would pass someday.

LABEL: 0x9529
STRING: I wanted this scene to be there forever.

LABEL: 0x955F
STRING: My steps were light, and I went deeper and deeper into the light.

LABEL: 0x959D
STRING: Urged on by the swirling lights, I took a closer look at each of them, and――

LABEL: 0x95F3
STRING: The source of it was life itself.

LABEL: 0x9623
STRING: There were the elusive jellyfish I saw earlier,

LABEL: 0x9657
STRING: the still, black fish that I had no idea what it was thinking about,

LABEL: 0x969B
STRING: the sea slugs that swayed in the waves...

LABEL: 0x96BF
STRING: ...And all other forms of life that lived in the deep sea, glowing softly.

LABEL: 0x9713
STRING: I walked, following their lights――

LABEL: 0x979E
STRING: As soon as I passed them by, the light withered and disappeared.

LABEL: 0x97DE
STRING: It was as if they were leading me down a path...

LABEL: 0x9818
STRING: ――Before long.

LABEL: 0x9832
STRING: Something familiar appeared in the place where the path of light cut off.

LABEL: 0x98D3
STRING: 「This is just too good to be true...」

LABEL: 0x9905
STRING: I grabbed the familiar submarine's ramp, slowly put my feet on it, and started climbing...

LABEL: 0x9965
STRING: ...What had just happened?

LABEL: 0x99A7
STRING: It was like I was led back to the <SHEEP III> by them――

LABEL: 0x9A00
STRING: An illusion.

LABEL: 0x9A14
STRING: Maybe I was still basking in the illusion as I dreamily climbed up the ramp...

LABEL: 0x9A7C
STRING: Before I pressed the button to open the hatch, I looked back at the sea floor.

LABEL: 0x9B13
STRING: Not that I had expected to see a garden of light or anything...

LABEL: 0x9B47
STRING: Only the endlessly dark sea was staring back at me.
